CustomField.description: Reporting Use 01 = Name 02 = Billing Street 03 = Billing City 04 = Billing State 05 = Billing Postal Code 06 = Billing Country 07 = Phone 08 = Fax 09 = Ownership 10 = Industry Group 11 = Industry Umbrella 12 = Type/Service Area
CustomField.formula: Client__r.Name + '|01|' + Client__r.BillingStreet + '|02|' + Client__r.BillingCity + '|03|' + Client__r.BillingState + '|04|' + Client__r.BillingPostalCode + '|05|' + Client__r.BillingCountry + '|06|' + Client__r.Phone + '|07|' + Client__r.Fax + '|08|' + TEXT(Client__r.Ownership) + '|09|' + Client__r.Industry_Group_REPORTING__c + '|10|' + Client__r.Industry_Umbrella_REPORTING__c + '|11|' + TEXT(Client__r.Type) + '|12|' + Client__r.Website + '|13|'
CustomField.label: Report Client Fields
